Sentencas: Oscillation of open circuit potential (OCP) and potential is observed for the methane oxidation reaction on (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O-3 (LSCM) and LSCM/YSZ composite electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) in weakly humidified methane (i.e., 97%CH4/3%H2O).
Titulo: Potential oscillation of methane oxidation reaction on (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O3 electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In dry methane (i.e.. 100%CH4), the potential oscillation is reduced significantly.
Titulo: Potential oscillation of methane oxidation reaction on (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O3 electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oscillation behaviour of OCP is also found to be strongly related to the temperature, the microstructure of the composite electrode and the fuel composition.
Titulo: Potential oscillation of methane oxidation reaction on (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O3 electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that the potential oscillation is thermally activated and is most likely associated with the adsorbed oxygen species on the electrode surface.
Titulo: Potential oscillation of methane oxidation reaction on (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O3 electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells
